items.sentence: Would you like a nice big piece of apple pie?
Can you tell me exactly what you really want?
You\'re the only one who doesn\'t look tired.
I\'ve got something that I really have to do.
That may be the reason Tom committed suicide.
Tom\'s voice was the loudest one in the room.
I ended up staying in Boston for three years.
That\'s not what you need to think about now.
You wouldn\'t want Tom to do that, would you?
I heard today that Tom will be retiring soon.
You should tell Tom that Mary can\'t do that.
You should tell Tom you\'re not feeling well.
I asked Tom what I should bring to the party.
I asked Tom why he did that the way I did it.
Tom didn\'t know that he had terminal cancer.
Tom and I traveled around the world together.
Tom and Mary worked together for three years.
Tom ate the entire bag of popcorn by himself.
The language Tom was speaking wasn\'t French.
Tom hasn\'t yet been bitten by a rattlesnake.
